Articles.Content:
I saw a crazy looking NASA mission concept and had to try the Kerbal version of it.

If you don't know what HAVOC is then the NASA video in the spoiler is a spoiler.

<iframe class="imgur-album" frameborder="0" height="550" src="//imgur.com/a/lKIXl/embed?background=ffffff&text=1a1a1a&link=4e76c9" width="100%"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2016-01-15T02:50:31Z" title="01/15/2016 02:50  AM" data-short="8 yr">January 15, 2016</time> by DBowman**
  
new BB sw
This was a really call mission, inspired me to want to do my own

Aww, I wanted to be the first to do it!

But yours is really good. I like the idea of the science pod, though I wish it had been more of a blimp, but there are no inflatable blimp mods yet. (Time for me to start learning some coding)

Have some tasty rep.

Chiken1880 - it's a pretty fun challenge, you should have a go.

I've formalized a Challenge around HAVOC: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/127792-Cry-HAVOC-rockets-blimps-Eve-the-Kerbliest-NASA-mission-concept](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/127792-Cry-HAVOC-rockets-blimps-Eve-the-Kerbliest-NASA-mission-concept) - Let loose the dogs!!
